author: Mary Carolan
title: Indebted couple told to ‘downsize’ as plan to remain in €1m home rejected
description: Pair say they are unable to afford house for them, four children and au pair with money left from sale
content:
A High Court judge has refused to approve proposed personal insolvency arrangements for a couple aimed at allowing their family to remain in a five-bed detached home, valued at 1 million in 2018, in a gated community outside Dublin. 
Allen and Elizabeth Nuzu… [+3944 chars]
